FuncDef:
The log enable command enables the log function of IPSec tunnel establishment and removal.
The log disable command disables the log function of IPSec tunnel establishment and removal.
The undo log enable command disables the log function of IPSec tunnel establishment and removal.
By default, the log function of IPSec tunnel establishment and removal is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the log function of IPSec tunnel establishment and removal is enabled.
-

Indicates that the log function of IPSec tunnel establishment and removal is disabled.
-

ExtraInfo: The log enable command enables the log function to log establishment and removal of IPSec tunnels established by IKE mode. After the log function is enabled, the establishment and removal information about IPSec tunnels is sent to the information center. The configuration of the information center determines the output direction of the log.
